CREATE TABLE "DatabaseInfo" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "version" INTEGER NOT NULL, "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "Database_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE "User" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "guid" UUID NOT NULL, "email" TEXT NOT NULL, "firstName" TEXT NOT NULL, "lastName" TEXT NOT NULL, "password" TEXT NOT NULL, "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "User_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE "Session" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "guid" UUID NOT NULL, "userId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "refreshToken" TEXT NOT NULL, "origin" TEXT NOT NULL, "userAgent" TEXT NOT NULL, "ipAddress" TEXT, "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, "revokedAt" TIMESTAMP(3), "expiresAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "Session_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE "Transaction" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "guid" UUID NOT NULL, "userId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "bankAccountId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "categoryId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "totalAmount" DECIMAL(65,30) NOT NULL, "description" TEXT NOT NULL, "installmentTotal" INTEGER, "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "Transaction_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE "Bank" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "guid" UUID NOT NULL, "name" TEXT NOT NULL, "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "Bank_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE "BankAccount" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "guid" UUID NOT NULL, "description" TEXT, "bankId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "userId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "branchCode" TEXT NOT NULL, "accountNumber" TEXT NOT NULL, "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "BankAccount_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));
CREATE TABLE "BankAccountPix" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "bankAccountId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "type" TEXT NOT NULL, "value" TEXT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "BankAccountPix_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE "Category" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "description" TEXT NOT NULL, "parentId" INTEGER, "userId" INTEGER, "type" "CategoryType" NOT NULL DEFAULT 'CREDIT', "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "Category_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE "PaymentMethod" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "name" TEXT NOT NULL, "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "PaymentMethod_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE "Payment" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "guid" UUID NOT NULL, "userId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "paymentMethodId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "transactionId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "cardId" INTEGER, "amount" DECIMAL(65,30) NOT NULL, "installmentNumber" INTEGER, "description" TEXT, "status" "PaymentStatus" NOT NULL, "dueDate" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, "paidAt" TIMESTAMP(3), "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "Payment_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));

CREATE TABLE "Card" ("id" SERIAL NOT NULL, "guid" UUID NOT NULL, "name" TEXT NOT NULL, "closingDay" INTEGER NOT NULL, "type" "CardType" NOT NULL, "description" TEXT NOT NULL, "limit" DECIMAL(65,30) NOT NULL, "bankAccountId" INTEGER NOT NULL, "createdAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT "Card_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"));
ALTER TABLE "Session" ADD CONSTRAINT "Session_userId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("userId") REFERENCES "User"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Transaction" ADD CONSTRAINT "Transaction_userId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("userId") REFERENCES "User"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Transaction" ADD CONSTRAINT "Transaction_bankAccountId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("bankAccountId") REFERENCES "BankAccount"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Transaction" ADD CONSTRAINT "Transaction_categoryId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("categoryId") REFERENCES "Category"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "BankAccount" ADD CONSTRAINT "BankAccount_bankId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("bankId") REFERENCES "Bank"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "BankAccount" ADD CONSTRAINT "BankAccount_userId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("userId") REFERENCES "User"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "BankAccountPix" ADD CONSTRAINT "BankAccountPix_bankAccountId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("bankAccountId") REFERENCES "BankAccount"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Category" ADD CONSTRAINT "Category_parentId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("parentId") REFERENCES "Category"("id") ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Category" ADD CONSTRAINT "Category_userId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("userId") REFERENCES "User"("id") ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Payment" ADD CONSTRAINT "Payment_cardId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("cardId") REFERENCES "Card"("id") ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Payment" ADD CONSTRAINT "Payment_userId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("userId") REFERENCES "User"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Payment" ADD CONSTRAINT "Payment_transactionId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("transactionId") REFERENCES "Transaction"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Payment" ADD CONSTRAINT "Payment_paymentMethodId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("paymentMethodId") REFERENCES "PaymentMethod"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
ALTER TABLE "Card" ADD CONSTRAINT "Card_bankAccountId_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("bankAccountId") REFERENCES "BankAccount"("id") ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE;
